item.title: Ravenquest
item.description: Álvaro Carvajal Castro Home / RavenQuest mail@raggaer.dev 01. RavenQuest RavenQuest Whitepaper. Backend made using Go. Website made using server-side rendering. Since RavenQuest is a Play2Earn blockchain game, the backend needs to integrate some blockchain elements in it: Multiple smart-contract using abigen bindings integration. NFT minting on-demand. Link between user-created accounts and their wallets, signing a message and verifying the ownership of the given address. Integrations with some AWS systems such as SNS, SES and S3.
